title: Till the Clouds Roll By 1949 (Musical, Biography) Lena Horne, Frank Sinatra, Judy Garland

sources.title: Till the Clouds Roll By 1949 (Musical, Biography) Lena Horne, Frank Sinatra, Judy Garland
sources.description:
The mammoth musical of Jerome Kern's dramatic life story! 
Biography of songwriter, Broadway pioneer, Jerome Kern. Unable to find immediate success in the USA, Kern sought recognition abroad. He journeyed to England where his dreams of success became real and where he met his future wife Eva.

Original title: Till the Clouds Roll By (1949) AKA: Silver Lining

This film is available with original english audio, and dubbed French, Portuguese & Spanish.  And subtitled in many more language options. 

Directors: Richard Whorf, Vincente Minnelli
Writers: Guy Bolton, George Wells
Stars: Robert Walker, Van Heflin, Lucille Bremer, Lena Horne, Frank Sinatra, Judy Garland, Angela Lansbury
Genres: Classics, Biography, Musical
Budget: $2,841,000 (estimated)
